Source code for objects.ExperimentSet

from objects.Metadata import Metadata
import os



[docs]class ExperimentSet:
    """Set of experiments for analysis
    Contains:
    metadata (Metadata) - additional information
    experiments (set(Experiment)) - set of experiments
    """
    def __init__(self):
        self.metadata = Metadata()
        self.experiments = list()


[docs]    def get_exp_by_name(self, name):
        for exp in self.experiments:
            head, tail = os.path.split(exp.metadata.path)
            if name == tail:
                return exp
        return False



[docs]    def get_exps_by_names(self, names):
        expList = []
        for exp in self.experiments:
            head, tail = os.path.split(exp.metadata.path)
            if tail in names:
                expList.append(exp)
        return expList
